text: "Too Close" is a 1998 song by American band Next. It was taken from their album Rated Next. It contains a sample of Christmas Rapping by Kurtis Blow. It went to number 1 in the United States and New Zealand, number 24 in the United Kingdom, number 75 in Scotland, number 12 in Australia and number 2 in Canada. ==Blue version== In 2001, British band Blue covered "Too Close" for their debut studio album All Rise. It went to number 1 in the United Kingdom and New Zealand, number 5 in Australia, number 2 in Scotland, number 19 in Norway and number 17 in Ireland. ===Track listings=== UK and Australian CD single # "Too Close" (radio edit) – 3:45 # "Too Close" (Blacksmith R&B; club rub) – 5:41 # "Too Close" (instrumental) – 3:45 # "Too Close" (video) – 3:45 UK cassette single and European CD single # "Too Close" (radio edit) – 3:45 # "Too Close" (Blacksmith R&B; club rub) – 5:41 == References == Category:1998 songs Category:1990s ballads Category:Blue (group) songs
